title: Product Brand
markdownDescription:
https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-developer-docs/docs/vtex-store-components-productbrand

The `ProductBrand` is a VTEX block that displays either the name or the logo of a product's brand.

`"vtex.store-components@3.x"`

props.markdownDescription: All available properties for this block.

blockClass.markdownDescription:
`string | string[]`

Block container class. This propâ€™s set value functions as a block identifier for CSS customizations.

displayMode.markdownDescription:
`string`

You should choose between `logo` or `text`. This will define if the product brand will be displayed by name or logo.

loadingPlaceholder.markdownDescription:
`string`

You should choose between `logo` or `text`. This will define if the loading placeholder should have the size of the logo or the text.

excludeBrands.markdownDescription:
`array`

The brand names or brand IDs listed in the array will never be displayed by the Brand component. It is usually useful to hide default or test brand names/logos on the store front.

withLink.markdownDescription:
`enum`

Defines the scenarios in which the product brand should have a link that leads to its website.

oneOf.markdownDescription:
`array`

Includes the link whenever the brand logo is displayed

`array`

Includes the link whenever the brand name is displayed

`array`

Includes the link whenever the brand logo or the brand name is displayed

brandName.markdownDescription:
`string`

The brand name. If no value is declared, the product context should provide the data.

brandId.markdownDescription:
`number`

The brand ID. If no value is declared, the product context should provide the data.

fallbackToText.markdownDescription:
`boolean`

This prop should only be used when `displayMode` is set to `logo`. It defines what should be done when the Product Brand was set to display a brand logo but no image was registered in the VTEX admin's Catalog. This prop is set as `true` by default, allowing the logo to be replaced with the brand name in those scenarios. When set as `false`, the store will not show the brand name instead of the brand logo.

height.markdownDescription:
`number`

It sets the logo height. It should only be used when `displayMode` is set to `logo`.
